title: Sell Springbank Local Barley
metaTitle: Sell Springbank Local Barley | 1966, 10, 11, 16 Year | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Springbank Local Barley whisky. We buy the newer 10/11/16 year releases and the legendary 1966 vintage bottlings.
heroSubhead: Direct buyer for Springbank Local Barley and Single Casks.
introParagraph: Springbank is the most traditional distillery in Scotland. The Local Barley series, using barley grown near Campbeltown, produces oily, complex, and highly collectible whisky.
conditionFactors: Vintage vs Age: 1966 Local Barley is a holy grail. Modern '11 Year' Local Barley is a different tier.
Barley Variety: Labels list the barley type (e.g. Bere, Optic). Completing the set adds value.
Label Condition: Springbank labels are simple paper; stains show easily.
Box: Modern releases come in simple cartons; must be present.
pricingFactors: Era: 1960s vs 2010s releases. The price difference is massive.
Release Year: The 2016 release (16 Year Old) marked the return of the series and is prized.
Rundlets & Kilderkins: Related small-cask series we also buy.
Market: Springbank 'mania' means prices are currently very strong.

faqs.question: Do you buy the 12 Year Cask Strength?
faqs.answer: Yes, especially older batches. Please list the Batch # or ABV.

faqs.question: What makes Local Barley special?
faqs.answer: Terroir. The barley is grown within miles of the distillery. It appeals to purists.

faqs.question: Do you buy Longrow?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy Longrow Red and older age statements (18, 21).

faqs.question: I have a 'Green Thistle' Springbank?
faqs.answer: That is an old 21-year bottling. Very valuable.

faqs.question: Do you buy the ceramic books?
What about 100 Proof?
faqs.answer: The old 100 Proof 10 Year Old is highly collectible.
